name: Devotion Eau de Parfum
about: Fragrance Family: Floral..Scent Type: Warm Floral..Key Notes: Candied Citrus, Orange Blossom, Vanilla..Fragrance Description: This eau de parfum contains top notes of tantalizing and candied citrus, a heart note of orange blossom, and a base note of alluring vanilla...About the Bottle: Devotion Eau de Parfum is also available in a travel size for the woman on the go. It offers portability, long-lasting allure, and a perfect gifting solution, encapsulating Dolce&Gabbana's timeless elegance in a captivating form...About the Fragrance: The Dolce&Gabbana Devotion Eau de Parfum fragrance is a sensory journey, seductive and reassuring, capable of evoking the positive values to which Dolce&Gabbana hold dear, symbolized by the Sacred Heart seal. An olfactory creation of exquisite contrasts, bright top notes, sensual base notes.
ingredients: Alcohol Denat., Parfum (Fragrance), Aqua (Water), Dipropylene Glycol, Limonene, Ethylhexyl Salicylate, Butyl Methoxydibenzoylmethane, Linalool, Citral, Geraniol, Citronellol, Benzyl Alcohol, Alcohol, Tris (Tetramethylhydroxypiperidinol) Citrate, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-Di-T-Butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Benzyl Benzoate, Ci 19140 (Yellow 5), Ci 14700 (Red 4), Ci 60730 (Ext. Violet 2), Ci 17200 (Red 33), Ci 42090 (Blue 1)...The list of ingredients is regularly updated. Please always read the list of ingredients on the packaging to ensure they are suitable for your personal use.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Fragrance is intensified by the warmth of your own body. Apply in the creases of your knees and elbows for a longer-lasting, stronger scent. .-After applying, avoid rubbing or dabbing skin. This breaks down the fragrance, causing it to wear off more quickly. .-If you prefer placing fragrance on your wrists, be sure to reapply after frequent handwashing, as this tends to rinse off the scent. .-Replace fragrance after 12 months. Expired perfumes more than a year old lose the integrity of the original scent...Eau de Toilette or Eau de Parfum?: .The difference lies in the volume of perfume oil. While EDT contains five to nine percent, EDP contains more, usually eight to 14 percent. EDPs, therefore, last longer and smell more intense.

I would expect it since thereu2019s rum notes in there and I genuinely think it makes the fragrance itself unique for me. I did a blind  purchase on this. And Iu2019d say I was impressed because it has everything I personally like. I just wish it smelled more of orange blossom. I wanted a bit more floral.

reviews.review_title: The perfect balance between citrus and vanilla!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I blind-bought the travel spray of this and loved it so much I just had to order the full size during the fragrance sale! This stuff is soooooo nice. Itu2019s a delicious, creamy, sweet, citrusy scent. Very soft and sugary and feminine without being u201ccheapu201d smelling or too juvenile. I feel so pretty when I wear it. I find it has nice staying power without being too overwhelming. Itu2019s a wonderful balance of the notes, itu2019s not OVERLY citrus but itu2019s not OVERLY vanilla either. Itu2019s the perfect orange creamsicle scent Iu2019ve been looking for. I will also say it pairs extremely well layered with Killianu2019s Love Donu2019t Be Shy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Confession: I was gifted this from my Mom after telling her how much I loved the commercials on tv LOL. So this was a complete blind-buy. I'm typically a true-vanilla girl, so I was excited to see the base notes of vanilla listed. At first spray, this smells like a super sugary lemon drop shot. I'm not sure what I was expecting, but it was definitely different! I find the dry down to be kind of powdery on me which I'm not really a fan of. I'm surprised other reviews haven't mentioned that because it's very apparent to me! If you like vanilla perfumes, I wouldn't reach for this first as it's definitely more citrusy than it is vanilla. As far as longevity, I am unable to smell this on myself after a couple hours which is a bummer. If you're into fruity & warmer vanilla, I would try the Burberry Her elixir over this. But I'm glad I gave it a shot-- it might be for you if you like citrusy, candy sort of sweetness.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Very in line with the vanilla and gourmand scents that are trending right now. Smells like lemon drop candies at first spray but dries down to a vanilla floral with faint citrus notes (more like lemon peel and not the usual orange blossom. I noticed that it smells a LOT like the recently discontinued pour femme by the same brand. So much so that im surprised they didnu2019t just make this a flanker.   The lemon notes lasted longer on paper and on clothing but onn my skin I smelled more of the canilla notes. Lasted 3-7 hours.   If you like gourmand scents you will probably like this.

reviews.review_title: A dream for Italian dessert enthusiasts

It goes from limoncello to the cocoa powder that tops a tiramisu. Thereu2019s a lot of citrus in this so itu2019s supposed to reminds of Italian lemons and Sicilian oranges. I definitely get that. As someone who is an Italian American this really does a good job of encapsulating Italian culture. Totally recommend

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The devotion eau de parfum by dolce&gabbana is a sweet, subtly sexy, and playful fragrance. This has a dominant citrus (mostly orange) scent mixed with a distinctly nostalgic vanilla. The combination of citrus and vanilla is very captivating and leaves behind a beautiful aroma that is playful while maintaining subtly sexy, the vanilla hits you after the citrus and is a little unexpected. I think this parfum is a perfect addition to any collection perfect to wear for a daytime date or a nice spring scent as well.   (I was gifted this product in exchange for my honest review)

I am very picky when floral scents comes. But this one I felt in love as soon as I tried. It is such a lovely and cozy floral warm scent. It is been my signature since then. Makes me feel so pleasant when I smell it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love everything about the scent from the first initial spray to the beautiful dry down. I heavily recommend this to people looking for a unique Vanilla scent or something thatu2019s going to make you smell like candy or citrus baked goods.

For my tastes, the fragrance is too sweet u2014 the base layer of vanilla definitely brings a sugary aspect to the u201cgourmandu201d part of the u201cbright gourmandu201d descriptor. That said, the formula of the fragrance was great. It lasted on my skin all day and into the evening.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This smells like creamy orange and vanilla on the dry down. The dry down is amazing, I only get citrus burst in the opening! Long lasting on my skin even as a newer release perfume. Also reminds me of LDBS by Kilian which I also have.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, gray hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I came into the store, specifically for a new perfume. The very moment I tried this perfume, I knew it was good..then I walked around a bit and it kept gettinbg evewn better, and after looking at different fragrancesa, this one was even stronger than when I first sprayed it. I bought the 3.4 oz at Sephora, in my Kohls store, at 9:30 a.m. Now, I only sprayed a small area on my arm, twice, and I went about my day. At 4:00 p.m. my hubs got home from work, and said, you smell so good..I said thank you for the early Christmas present..and then proceeded to tell him what it was, and I was surprised that he could smell it, by just kissing me hello. At 8:00 p.m. I smelled my arm and the scent was slightly there. So, as for how long it really lasts..I would say an easy 6-7 hours. I am thrilled with my purchase.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin

Ju2019ai achete le Devotion en ligne chez Sephora! Je lu2019ADORE! Doux mais enveloppant comme une couverture moelleuse! Je ne mu2019en lasse pas! A se procurer sans faute!ud83dude0a

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin

The orange blossom is lightly peeking out, with a lovely touch of citrus. It very quickly turns warm, sweet, dessert-y vanilla and citrus. Imagine an Orange creamsicle + vanilla pudding scent. Not quite a dupe for Xerjoff Lira, but similar scent family for sure. It dries down a touch more powdery, but still very vanilla heavy. Good projection and staying power overall. Personally not my taste, but I can imagine this would be lovely if you enjoy your vanilla/gourmand fragrances!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair

Itu2019s not something I would buy even though the dry down was a nice scent but if you like citrus and musk mixed together I think youu2019d be interested in this.

The opening is zesty so keep that in mind, the candied lemon is strong and itu2019s challenging until it blends in to the middle notes. This is a perfect new release from Dolce & Gabanna for fall & winter, itu2019s giving lemon Christmas cookies in the most sophisticated way. Longevity is impressive, I catch whiffs of it all day without getting a headache. 10/10.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is a great citrusy gourmand perfume. I definitely pick up on the candied citrus notes in here, so its sweet and citrusy, but not overwhelming on any fronts. If youu2019re a fan of orange creamsicle, this is the closest you can get to that smell in a perfume while still smelling relatively u201cadultu201d. This would make a good everyday perfume for someone who likes vanilla and citrus notes/perfumes, especially for the spring and summer. I could also see this being a good gift option for someone trying to buy perfume as a gift for someone else. I would say itu2019s a relatively safe blind buy/gift purchase. I might look into adding a larger size of this into my perfume rotation for the spring/summer.

This won't replace my signature scent (Valentino Donna Born in Roma), and I wish it lasted longer on me, but if you like vanilla scents you should give it a try. Some people say it smells like Prada Paradoxe, but I didn't like that scent at all and I love this one.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The first time I smelled Devotion I got zero of the opening notes and went straight to the warm, slightly dusty and benignly sweet mid to dry down notes. I like it immediately. I read that it is supposed to smell like Panattone so I tested it again and got a blast of lemon akin to rinds baking in the oven. I nearly didn't purchase this. The intense lemon lasted about a half hour. I went ahead and got a travel size, which I am somewhat regretting because I really like this fragrance. The bottle is beautiful also. It does come out different every time I spray it. Both full size and travel size. Sometimes it is like the process of making Panettone and sometimes the Panettone itself and other times parts of the Panettone are missing, like the lemon. The lemon changes from strong rinds to sugar lemon to lemon pastilles each different day I use it.  It has not been the sliced lemon jelly candies coated in sugar. Mostly more tart but still much sweetness to the opening. I crave the mid and dry down notes. Lightly warm, slightly dusty like cardamom or another spice and slightly gourmand. This is a more personal fragrance. I did notice that the travel spray is much lighter than the full size bottle maybe due to the amount in the spray, not sure. It does last at least 6 hours on me. I would categorize this as a lazy day, spa day or casual fragrance but it could be a nice bridal fragrance too.Not overwhelming for me except when the lemon gives a good smack. I do recommend this fragrance.
